param.name: DEM
param.dialogReference:
DEM

Grid, input

Digital Elevation Model that has to be processed

param.name: DEM_PREPROC
param.dialogReference:
Preprocessed DEM

Grid, output, optional

optional

Preprocessed DEM. If this is not set changes will be stored in the original DEM grid.

param.name: METHOD
param.dialogReference:
Method

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Deepen Drainage Routes

[1] Fill Sinks

Default: 1

param.name: THRSHEIGHT
param.dialogReference:
Threshold Height

Floating point

Minimum: 0.000000

Default: 100.000000

The maximum depth to which a sink is considered for removal.
